title: Wind Cave National Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do        NPS   Â    With two parks in one there's always something to do above ground or below. Follow these links for more information on:    Hiking Over 30 miles of trails cover the prairie, forests, and streams in between.   For Kids   Guided Tours Everything you need to know about tours and times.   Backcountry Camping Free permits are available at the visitor center for backcountry campers.   Horseback Riding
